## Day Prior to Surgery

-   Clear liquids for dinner evening prior
-   You will receive instructions regarding medicines

## Day of Surgery

Unless instructed otherwise:

-   You will be notified regarding *arrival* time, which is usually 2-3 hours before the *surgery* time.
-   Nothing to eat or drink after midnight


## Medicines the Day of Surgery

-   Medicines with a sip of water or *black* coffee
  - No milk or cream
  - Surgery will be cancelled for milk/cream
